name: EVOLVE® CLEAR-WHEY ISOLATE - KARKADEH (Limited Edition)
description:
Why settle for boring when you can have the taste of RAMADAN in a shake? We took it personally and made sure this isn’t just another protein, it’s a refreshing twist on tradition.

Made with REAL KARKADEH extract! The perfect blend of tangy and sweet.
Feels like drinking a cold, KARKADEH JUICE straight from an Egyptian Ramadan table.
EVOLVE® Full Disclosure Label
24G Protein from Clear Whey Isolate
Light, Refreshing & Instantly Mixable
F&#!ing Delicious
20 Servings of Pure Ramadan Vibes
This ISN’T your regular whey. We get it, everyone overthinks protein powders. We’re keeping it simple. A premium clear whey isolate that tastes so good, you’ll forget it’s protein. The EVOLVE® CLEAR WHEY.

name: EVOLVE® WHEY - DATES & MILK (Limited Edition)
description:
For the first time in the world, Your FAVORITE Ramadan drink has come to reality. But with a twist that will make you go “Wa7awy ya Wa7awy”.

-Has REAL date pieces! Just like the real deal.
-Giving you that full Ramadan experience. Seriously.
-EVOLVE® Full Disclosure Label
-20G Protein from Whey Concentrate
-Blends INSTANTLY
-F*&#!ing Delicious
-1.26kgs of Greatness (30 servings)

Never been done before in this world. In our opinion, everyone gets all crazy and overthinks “protein powders”. We’re keeping it super simple. A premium whey protein concentrate that makes you keep coming back with its out-of-this-world flavors. The EVOLVE® WHEY.

name: EVOLVE® WHEY - CHOCOLATE SPREAD
description:
Why eat out of a jar when you can finally have CHOCOLATE HAZELNUT SPREAD in a shake? We took it personally that we added REAL ingredients that are used in chocolate bars!

 -Has REAL HAZELNUT pieces inside! The perfect combo to satisfy your cravings.
-Feels like you’re eating out of a jar of chocolate (The N one)
-EVOLVE® Full Disclosure Label
-23G Protein from Whey Concentrate
-Blends INSTANTLY
-F*&#!ing Delicious

name: EVOLVE® WHEY - STRAWBERRY TART
description:

 -Has REAL freeze-dried STRAWBERRY & TART CRUST pieces inside! The perfect combo to satisfy your cravings.

description:

name: EVOLVE® CREA-GOAT 40 Serv.
description:
Looking small huh? EVOLVE®️ Crea-GOAT was crafted so you can Crea-TE GOAT GAINS!


-Purest & highest grade of creatine monohydrate in the world (Creapure®️).
-Only one ingredient. Transparent AF.
-EVOLVE®️ Full Disclosure Label
-5g of Creatine Monohydrate (Clinically dosed)
-Dry scoop it or add it to whatever (gainzz)
-200g of Greatness (40 GOATED servings)

This ISN’T your regular creatine supplement. In our opinion, everyone gets all crazy and overthinks “creatine powders”. We’re keeping it super simple. A premium and the highest quality grade of creatine in the world mixed with our EVOLVE®️ CULTURE. The EVOLVE®️ WAY.

name: EVOLVE® PRE-GOAT - Halal Wine - 40 Serv.
description:
Feeling weak? PRE GOAT®️ is here to turn you into a beast! Crafted for those who dare to defy limits, this pre-workout will unleash the raging exiled goat within you, ready to conquer the gym with a vengeance.

- Potent blend of performance-boosting ingredients.
- Only the essentials. Transparent AF.
- EVOLVE®️ Full Disclosure Label
- Clinically dosed for maximum effect.
- Dry scoop it or mix it with your favorite drink (gainzz)
- 565g of ferocity (40 servings)

This ISN’T your ordinary pre-workout. Forget the fluff. We’ve packed PRE GOAT®️ with nothing but the purest, most effective ingredients to fuel your rage and amplify your performance. Embrace the EVOLVE®️ CULTURE. The EVOLVE®️ WAY.

DISCLAIMER: 

Store the pre-workout in a dry place away from moisture and heat (do not store in the kitchen).
NEVER remove the silica gel pack inside the pre-workout.
Do not get water inside the pre-workout, whether from wet hands or a wet scoop.
